bill_title: revise provisions regarding vehicle dealer warranty compensation.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to revise provisions regarding vehicle dealer warranty compensation. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That chapter 32-6B be amended with a NEW SECTION: A manufacturer that issues a campaign, recall, service program, stop-sale order, or any other program to address a defect or safety concern must compensate the vehicle dealer pursuant to § 32-6B-61. The manufacturer may not, in order to evade this duty: (1) Alter or remove the price, name, or number of any vehicle part; or (2) Provide a vehicle part at no cost. In addressing the defect or safety concern, the manufacturer may not impose upon a vehicle dealer any form of cost recovery fee or surcharge.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
